abstract: HSBC doesn’t need to raise huge amounts of capital, even if Morgan Stanley is insisting otherwise in an unfortunately timed note it released this week. But in a climate where you can never have too much capital, an injection of equity wouldn’t hurt the bank.
lead_paragraph: HSBC doesn’t need to raise huge amounts of capital, even if Morgan Stanley is insisting otherwise in an unfortunately timed note it released this week. But in a climate where you can never have too much capital, an injection of equity wouldn’t hurt the bank.

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
